arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax live: Blues look to maintain strong form in Champions League clash
arts.sum: The Blues face bottom-of-the-table Ajax in a European encounter they should win

arts.ttl: Jorrel Hato: Should Chelsea fans be worried about €44m summer signing?
arts.sum: Former Chelsea defender Jeffrey Bruma has urged patience with rarely-used summer signing Jorrel Hato, insisting that the Blues 'have a plan' for the Netherlands international. Hato's lack of action in a World Cup season has led to consternation in his native Netherlands, but former Chelsea defender Jeffrey Bruma insists that people need not worry about the teenager.

arts.ttl: How to Watch Chelsea vs. Ajax on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Chelsea can claim their fourth win in succession when they host a struggling Ajax side.

arts.ttl: Chelsea add 33 players to Champions League squad ahead of Ajax clash
arts.sum: Chelsea have taken the unprecedented step of adding 33 players to their Champions League squad ahead of Wednesday’s clash against Ajax . Among the players added are Thiago Silva’s 16-year-old son Isago and highly rated teens Ryan Kavuma-McQueen, Ibrahim Rabbaj and Shim Mheuka.

arts.ttl: Chelsea bidding to extend 11, 12-game streaks, set unwanted first for Ajax in 36 years
arts.sum: Chelsea will be bidding to extend two streaks and set an unwanted one for Ajax when the two teams meet in Wednesday's Champions League fixture at Stamford Bridge

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Chelsea will be aiming to secure their first home Champions League victory of the season on Wednesday when they welcome a struggling Ajax side to Stamford Bridge. Enzo Maresca’s team bounced back with a win on matchday two but face significant injury problems.
